post.author: Pan-
post.body:
When i record a demo of a map that is part of an addon pak then i can't run the demo with demo_enforceFS 0. Keep getting the error:
Quote:
idRenderWorldLocal::InitFromMap: maps/mp/mapname.proc not found
Error ERP_DROP: couldn't load maps/mp/mapname

well, i always could run my own demo with demo_enforceFS 1 or 2. But if someone sends me his demo and he is using some maps i don't have and that aren't addon paks then i am unable to run the demo with the pak files. In order to run his demo i need all the pak files he has in q4base and that could be up to 125 pak files.
Do you know a workaround for this?

This just applies for server demos.
